title: Bug 15899 - Close all saved does not work all the time
OB: When using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, after creating a new file f1.txt and selecting 'Close All Saved' from the file menu, the file is not being closed.
EB: The file should be closed when 'Close All Saved' is selected, since no changes have been made to the file.
SR:
1. Open the application using build 20020508 with the latest UI code.
2. Create a new file named f1.txt.
3. Go to the File menu.
4. Select 'Close All Saved' from the menu.
